text: Va Ūst, ki peşopeşi rahmati xud ʙodhoro ʙa ʙaşorat mefiristad. Cun ʙodho aʙrhoi garonʙorro ʙardorand, Mo on aʙrro ʙa sarzaminhoi murda (az ʙeoʙī) ravon sozem va az on ʙoron mefiristem va ʙo ʙoron har guna mevahoero merūjonem. Cunon ki zamini murdaro ʙo oʙi ʙoron zinda megardonem, murdagonro niz incunin zinda megardonem, şojad pand gired
